title: It only took 20 years, but the Strategic Management Society now Believes the Lean Startup is a Strategy
summary: I’ve always thought of myself as a practitioner. In the startups I was part of, the only “strategy” were my marketing tactics on how to make the VP of Sales the richest person in the company. After I retired, I created Customer Development and co-created the Lean Startup as a simple methodology which codified founders […]
